label: FDeviceDetailsCommands()
detail: Function (# pragma once # include " CoreTypes . h " # include " Styling / AppStyle . h " # include " Framework / Commands / Commands . h " # include " Framework / Commands / InputChord . h " # include " Internationalization / Text . h " # include " Templates / SharedPointer . h " # define LOCTEXT_NAMESPACE " DeviceDetailsCommands " class FDeviceDetailsCommands : public TCommands<FDeviceDetailsCommands> { public :)
insertText: FDeviceDetailsCommands() : TCommands<FDeviceDetailsCommands>( "DeviceDetails", NSLOCTEXT("Contexts", "DeviceDetails", "Device Details"), NAME_None, FAppStyle::GetAppStyleSetName())

label: UI_COMMAND()
insertText: UI_COMMAND(Share, "Share", "Share the device with other users", EUserInterfaceActionType::ToggleButton, FInputChord())

label: UI_COMMAND()
insertText: UI_COMMAND(Connect, "Connect", "Connect to the device", EUserInterfaceActionType::Button, FInputChord())

label: UI_COMMAND()
insertText: UI_COMMAND(Disconnect, "Disconnect", "Disconnect from the device", EUserInterfaceActionType::Button, FInputChord())

label: UI_COMMAND()
insertText: UI_COMMAND(PowerOff, "Power Off", "Power off the device", EUserInterfaceActionType::Button, FInputChord())

label: UI_COMMAND()
insertText: UI_COMMAND(PowerOffForce, "Power Off (Force)", "Power off the device (forcefully close any running applications)", EUserInterfaceActionType::Button, FInputChord())

label: UI_COMMAND()
insertText: UI_COMMAND(PowerOn, "Power On", "Power on the device", EUserInterfaceActionType::Button, FInputChord())
